rpx
  • Reference

Return recent PX announcements

Queries the PX rss feed file for the latest PX dataset announcements.

pxannounced()

Value

A data.frame with announcements data set identifiers, publication dates and annoucement messages.

Examples

pxannounced()
#> 15 new ProteomeXchange annoucements
#>     Data.Set    Publication.Data             Message
#> 1  PXD004299 2017-06-12 15:27:10 Updated information
#> 2  PXD004298 2017-06-12 15:26:35 Updated information
#> 3  PXD004297 2017-06-12 15:25:58 Updated information
#> 4  PXD004296 2017-06-12 15:25:24 Updated information
#> 5  PXD004295 2017-06-12 15:24:52 Updated information
#> 6  PXD004362 2017-06-12 14:59:38 Updated information
#> 7  PXD004426 2017-06-12 14:32:26 Updated information
#> 8  PXD004521 2017-06-12 14:31:39 Updated information
#> 9  PXD004562 2017-06-12 14:31:05 Updated information
#> 10 PXD004592 2017-06-12 14:30:23 Updated information
#> 11 PXD004613 2017-06-12 14:29:51 Updated information
#> 12 PXD004452 2017-06-12 14:29:14                 New
#> 13 PXD004097 2017-06-12 11:49:30                 New
#> 14 PXD003608 2017-06-12 11:25:02                 New
#> 15 PXD004802 2017-06-12 11:22:23                 New
